data.text:
@thehill Wake up #Americans 

Russia collapsing in failed war, economic collapse, USA doesn’t believe masks work, doing zero to prevent spread as China has zero Covid policy

Americans suffer long term effects & healthcare costs = disaster 
as China becomes number 1 world power 
Wake up

@thehill I got covid in late 2020. I STILL have long term brain issues-phantom smells (like cigarette smoke) and also a real problem with being unable to find the right words while speaking. Anyone with long covid would attest to this.
@superlorna69 @thehill Got triggered because they couldn’t answer a simple question? 😂 https://t.co/bbNg2J0ypX
@thehill Awesome let's get rid of masks so I can suffer more brain damage.
@superlorna69 @DavidPolus Typical anti vaxxers trying to put words in other peoples mouths. It’s their narrative to attempt to gaslight others into their make believe fantasy world
@superlorna69 @thehill Where exactly in the study did they distinguish between those who were vaccinated and those who were not?
